Package.Name: The Plymouth Route
Package.Author: Chris Lees
Package.Description: The Plymouth Route runs for 33km, from Plymouth to Liskeard.\r\n\r\nThis route has been designed for full 3D viewing throughout.

Package.Name: British Signals for openBVE
Package.Author: TSC Team
Package.Description: This package contains the BRSigs, BRSema4Sigs and BRSigs_Open signal libraries, which are necessary for running most UK routes.\r\n\r\nThe files and documentation included in this package are Â© Anthony Bowden, Steve Green, Tony Haylor and Simon Gathercole, and have been released as public domain material.

Package.Name: BR Class 52 'Western' - D1015 Western Champion
Package.Author: Christopher Lees
Package.Description:
This locomotive runs on the latest version of the BVEC_ATS
train systems plugin, and represents what I feel to be a
very reasonable portrayal of the prototype!

Feature Include:
* Single and twin engine operation.
* Prototypical startup sequence.
* Working turbocharger.
* Working AWS.
* Full external view.
* Fully functional bogies.

As with all of my recent products, this locomotive has been designed to work on any platform that OpenBVE supports.

This release has been configured with a full set of 8 MK1 coaches on the drawhook (280 tons!)

The driver's guide may be found here:
http://www.bvecornwall.co.uk/wordpress/br-class-52-western-drivers-guide/
